name: Herbed New Potato Salad
description: This dish is traditionally served on Midsummer in Sweden to celebrate the new potatoes in the garden.
recipeIngredient: 24 ounces new potatoes (any larger potatoes cut in two)

recipeInstructions.text: Put new potatoes in a large pot. Cover with cold water and add 1 teaspoon salt. Bring water to a boil and let potatoes cook until fork-tender, 8-10 minutes. Drain potatoes.
In a large bowl, toss together white balsamic vinegar and warm new potatoes. Let sit for 5 minutes.
Add scallions, parsley, chives, and olive oil. Toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper.
